verify(Path, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class acdp.misc.ACDP
Checks the integrity of the specified WR database by checking the integrity of the table data for each table of the database, and, provided that the fix argument is set to true, makes an attempt to fix any detected integrity violations that have an automatic fix.
